results.question: 查询复购用户
results.generated_sql: SELECT o.user_id, COUNT(o.order_number) AS order_count FROM orders o JOIN users u ON o.user_id = u.user_id GROUP BY o.user_id HAVING COUNT(o.order_number) > 1;
results.ground_truth_sql: SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS order_count FROM orders GROUP BY

results.question: 显示最近一周的库存变动
results.generated_sql: SELECT il.reason AS 动因, p.stock_quantity AS 当前库存, il.previous_quantity AS 变动前库存, il.new_quantity AS 变动后库存 FROM inventory_logs il JOIN products p ON il.product_id = p.id WHERE il.created_at >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) ORDER BY il.created_at DESC;
results.ground_truth_sql: SELECT * FROM inventory_logs WHERE created_at >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) ORDER BY created_at DESC
